entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as someone who managed to shake everyone off and climb up to the dormitory as fast as he could.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is described as lying on his bed in the otherwise empty dormitory, still fully dressed.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron had a conversation where Harry asked Ron 'Where've you been?' and Ron responded with 'Oh hello'.
Harry observed that Ron's smile was more like a grimace, indicating something was wrong with the way Ron was smiling.
